column1: pushed through outside off, he is back trying to force to cover, gets an inside edge onto pad
steps outside off and flips a sweep up and over backward square to the vacant boundary! Great shot from Carey to get down on one knee early and use his bottom hand to flick behind square

Carey is run out! Horrible mix up! Shorter length outside off, he is back and punching to Edwards at backward point on the circle, Carey and Weatherald are unsure about a single, then start to run and then Weatherald stops and sends him back, but Carey is caught miles out as Edwards throws to Philippe! There was no call between either player!
shorter and wider, he dabs this fine of short third
shorter on middle, he defends to midwicket
fuller on middle, he punches without any timing down to long on
134kph, back of a length, nipping in, it runs off the thigh pad and rolls fine of short fine, O'Keefe runs from deep square but can't cut it off!
good length wide of off, he's caught on the crease prodding but is beaten
138kph, back of a length on off, he's back and defending into the on side
139kph, fuller angled into middle, he clips this to Abbott at midwicket, he misfields, they consider a run on the misfield but wisely call no
good length wide of off, he punches off the back foot past backward point, wide of third man, they turn an easy two in one with some cautious running
beaten trying to dab a late cut to a good length ball outside off
good length drifting in, he's back and giving room and forcing to cover
tossed up higher, he drives to mid off on the circle and they run a tight single after a late call! But they get home easily
shorter and slower, he mistimes a cut to point
he lofts this inside out just straight of wide mid off for four! He sliced this, didn't time it at all but mid off was very wide and it found the gap
slower and a good length on off, he dabs from the stumps fine of short third man
fuller drifting into middle, he drives firmly to long on
127kph, back of a length on off, he defends from the crease to the gap at point
125kph, angled into off stump, he's back and across tucking it behind square to the man in the deep
129kph, good length angled in, it catches him on the thigh guard and drops down into the off side
130kph, good length angled into off, he chops this off the inside edge onto pad, it rolls away and Lehmann calls him through
128kph, back of a length, he backs away and mistimes a cross bat slog that rolls to mid on and they take a tight one
130kph, good length on middle and leg, he tucks this neatly behind square
beaten flashing at a back of a length 141kph ball just outside off! He was cramped for room and beaten by the extra bounce and pace
good length outside off, he frees the arms and nails a square drive straight to the man at cover-point
beaten again flashing at a cut shot when it was too close to cut!
142kph, very full tailing in, he jams the bat down and squeezes it out straight to backward point

caught at mid on! Weatherald has holed out! This was a good length, Weatherald's frustration boiled over, he tried to launch this down the ground, got under it and skied it straight up to mid on, Henriques called everyone out on the circle and took the catch.
good length wide of off, he late cuts past the wide slip to third man
125kph, short slower ball, he picks this, sits back and pulls this easily behind square! No one back defending the boundary behind square
136kph, good length angled into middle, he sits back and works this forward of square
good length on middle, he defends comfortably from the crease
130kph, fuller length outside off, he drives nicely on the up but straight to mid off

caught at short third man! Shorter length wide of off, he flashes hard at a cut shot, gets a thick edge that flies straight to O'Keefe at short third man on the circle and he takes the catch easily! A touch unlucky for that to find the man
133kph, fuller length in middle, he turns this with the angle square of midwicket for a single
good length pitching leg and spinning into the pad, tucking him up for room
pushed through on leg, he works this with the spin behind square for a single
flatter and shorter and Lehmann is back and late cutting beautifully picking the gap between backward point and short third man and it races away!
fuller length, he late cuts again but mistimes it
very full drifting in, he misses trying to whip against the turn, it slides on and hits the pad but it's going down leg
shorter length on middle, he's back and forcing to long on
77kph, short down leg, he tries to pull but it holds in the pitch, it comes off the cue end of the bat and drops down
shorter on leg, he pulls this one properly behind square to deep square
shorter and wider, 80kph, he's back and cutting hard to deep cover-point
84kph, good length on middle, he's back giving room and punching to cover on the circle
82kph, arm ball pushed through, he backs away and cuts off the stumps to backward point
81kph, drifting in, good length, he punches off the back foot to cover
waist high full toss! It was a back of a the hand slower ball that slipped out, he tried to cut it away but he chopped it off the bottom edge
135kph, low full toss at middle and off, he miscues this down to long on
133kph, full on leg stump, he glances this around the corner to fine leg
130kph, good length on middle, he pushes on the front foot towards mid on
good length angled into off, he tucks this off the back foot the gap at midwicket
129kph, back of a length just wide of off, he cuts neatly wide of third man and they run well for two
131kph, back of a length on middle, he creates room and cuts to wide third man again, it's straight to the man on the rope but Wells takes on the throw for two and beats him! Great running
83kph, shorter on leg, he's back and punching down to long off
tossed up way wide, might have slipped out and called wide
slog sweep launched over midwicket! Superb strike. It was a good length on the stumps but he got down low and cracked it over the short boundary against the spin!
good length, he's back and working against the turn to deep midwicket
tossed up on middle, he stays leg side and drives to long off
tossed up wide of off, he frees the arms and hammers a sweep shot along the ground to deep midwicket, Hughes is stretched on the rope and misfields to allow two
shorter outside off, he's back and punching well past cover, Silk runs around from deep point but can't cut off the second
132kph, full on off, he drives, mistiming to mid off
he tries to slog sweep a length ball to the short boundary, slices a high top edge that flies high but safely fine of wide third man, they get two
133kph, shorter on the hip, he's back and flicking this off the hip to wide fine leg
107kph slower ball, he turns this to midwicket and they take on Vince on the circle and beats the throw
good length outside off, he square drives very firmly to deep point
133kph short ball, he pulls but mistimes it to wide long on
135kph, good length wide of off, he steps outside off early looking to go leg side and it forced to punch it straight to point
full outside off, he clears the left leg and slices this hard in the air but it lands short of deep point
136kph, full into leg stump, he works this off his pads nicely through square leg
he steps outside off early, Dwarshuis follows with a wide slower ball cutter, Wells misses the cut and it's not called wide

Bowled him! Sensational skills from Dwarshuis! Wells stepped way outside off again, targeting the short boundary, instead of going wide again, Dwarshuis fires a yorker at leg stump and bowls Wells around his legs! Incredible skill to react to the move.
good length on off, he defends from the crease into the off side
very full drifting into middle, he yorks himself digging it out
good length wide of off, he tries to square drive but gets a bottom edge that bounces into the keeper
pushed through wide of off, he dabs this to short third man
94kph, fired through on middle, he's back and punching down to long on
100kph, arm ball fired at middle, he pushes towards long on, Manenti runs across and cuts it off
very full outside off, he tries to square drive but misses

Stumped! Great bowling and sharp keeping! A 77kph tempter looped up outside off, he leans out to drive, it spins past the edge, Short over-balances and Philippe whips off the bails quickly and Short can't get his foot back
tossed up outside off, 76kph, he drives firmly to long off
shorter outside off, 78kph, Lehmann is back and waiting, he cuts hard and beats the man at deep cover-point! Good timing from Lehmann given there was no pace to work with
shorter on off, 80kph, he's back and working this to midwicket
fuller on leg, 81kph, he tucks this behind square and they get a tight one
79kph, tossed up outside off, he steps forward and defends into the off side
117kph, slower ball, good length angled across, he opens the face and runs this down to third man
136kph, good length wide of off, it beats him as he punches on the back foot. Beaten for pace and a hint of sideways movement
135kph, full on leg, he glances this neatly behind square and they run a couple
full into leg stump, he clips this off the pads to wide fine leg
122kph, slower ball off cutter, he's back and cutting straight to backward point
120kph, slower ball cutter, shorter and wider, he cuts off a thick outside edge that flies safely to third man
84kph, fuller on leg, he sweeps behind square to the man in the deep
tossed up outside off, he drives well past cover wide of long off and they get an easy two
85kph, fuller and wider again, he square drives to deep cover-point
very slow outside off, he skips out and mistimes back to the bowler
looped up on middle, he sweeps hard to deep backward square
84kph, wide of off, spinning further away, he drives but misses
130kph, yorker hits him on the pad close to leg stump, huge appeal for LBW, not out is the call, they make a late call to take a tight leg bye.
135kph, yorker on off, he backs aways and steers this to point
110kph, back of the hand slower ball, he drives firmly to long on who is wide, they think about two but don't go
he sets up for the paddle ramp and pulls it off getting it fine of short fine! It was a full yorker, he set up facing square on and just paddled it fine
good length into middle and leg, he gets an inside edge onto pad
115kph, slower ball, he clears the leg and swings hard but mistimes it to long on

caught by Hughes running back from point! He made that catch look easy! It was full outside off, Lehmann gave room to carve over point, he sliced it high over backward point, three men converged, Hughes casually jogged back and took the catch easy as you like!
133kph, yorker on middle, he gets a thick edge fine of third man and runs a couple
138kph, full yorker wide of off, he tries to jam it out through point but misses

dropped by Vince at cover! Maybe saved four in reality! It was a low full toss outside off, Neser lasered a drive in the air, Vince got airborne diving to his right, got two hands to it but couldn't hold on
Rashid moves outside off, Dwarshuis fires way wide, nearly off the pitch and it's not called! That was ridiculous. Should have been a wide
good length angled across, he swings hard and misses
134kph, low full toss on angled into the thigh and he swings this easily behind square to the short boundary!
136kph, full toss that shapes away a touch, he swings really hard and misses and it just missed off stump!
126kph, length ball, he tries to swing it away over the leg side, gets it off the toe of the bat and it rolls past the diving Abbott to mid off
short and wide slower ball and he plays a helicopter cut slicing it up over short third man! Great shot
Rashid steps outside off then backs away, and misses a good length delivery

caught and bowled! 122kph, back of a length, he set himself and tried to swing it away over the leg side, he miscued it off the top edge, it balloons towards cover but Abbott runs across and calls his teammate out to take the catch
launches a low full way back into the stands over wide long on! The sound off the back was incredible! He did well to whip the bottom hand under it and launch it way back
full and wide, he hammers a square drive along the ground to deep cover-point
105kph, slower ball, beats Siddle completely, misses leg stump, Neser calls Siddle through for a bye and Philippe doesn't fire at the stumps
flicked over deep backward square into the stands! Full on the pads and he picked it up and got all of it over the short boundary!
wide of off, he carves this through point, Vince comes in off the rope and they take on the throw for a second and the throw is wide

LBW! 106kph slower ball out of the back of the hand does the trick! It deceived Neser and dipped on him as he tried to heave it through the leg side, he gets him on the foot infront of middle stump. Not a tough call for the umpire. That was plumb
good length down the leg side and called a wide
138kph, back of a length outside off, he pulls nicely behind square, Rashid comes around and makes a sliding save
142kph, good length outside off, he mistimes a drive to mid on
138kph, shorter on the hip, he pulls nicely to short fine and the man takes a good diving save to knock it down to save three
138kph, short ball he tries to pull and is hit in the stomach. It came off the inside edge onto the hip and he doubled over and fell on his back. He's up though and OK.
edged and it flies over second slip! He tried to whip a good length ball through midwicket, closed the face, got a thick edge and it flew over the second slip and fine of third man
good length, on middle, he tries to work to leg but misses and is taken on the thigh pad
134kph, nearly chops on a drive! It was a fuller length wide of off, get a thick inside edge but it bounces past leg stump. Wasn't that close in the end

LBW! Philippe shuffled across the crease, Neser delivered fuller and straight, he tried to whip, missed, hit on the knee roll infront of middle and was trapped plumb! Hawkeye had it hitting the middle and leg bail!
130kph, good length outside off, he pushes on the front foot to cover
130kph, back of a length on middle, he's back and tucking this to the gap at midwicket
good length on leg, he turns this wide of mid on for a single
good length outside off, 135kph, he tries to square drive on the up but misses
141kph, good length top of off, he defends to backward point from the crease
he punches a drive on the up and times this magnificently straight of cover! What a shot hitting this on the rise. It was 145kph and he just leaned on it through cover.
good length on middle and leg, he defends to the gap at midwicket
145kph, full angled into off, he whips this with the bottom hand gets it through the gap at midwicket and it races to the rope! Unbelievable timing!
whips this one up and over midwicket! Even better! 143kph, angled into middle and leg and he whips it beautifully with the bottom hand

caught at cover-point! Picked out Ingram! Back of a length outside off, Vince gave himself room and cracked it flat in the air to cover-point, he smoked it but hit it straight to Ingram and he takes a good catch.
131kph, good length outside off, he punches off the back foot to cover-point
132kph, full outside off, he leans into a superb cover-drive but hits it straight to cover-point
130kph, back of a length on leg stump, he tries to whip through square leg but misses and is taken on the pad
he picks the gap punching this between the two fielder backward and forward of point! He stood tall, opened the face and punched this elegantly through the gap and it races away
full on the pads and he glances this easily wide of short fine and that with be four more!
117kph, slower ball, full on middle, he drives back to the bowler
132kph, good length outside off, he defends with the full face from the crease
132kph, back of a length, he charges down the track and tries to heave over the leg side but it beaten but the bounce
shorter length, he stays back and pulls nicely behind square and it races away!
135kph, good length outside off, he defends on the front foot to cover
134kph, full on the pads, whipping through square leg to the man in the deep
he leans on another glorious cover drive picking the gap between cover and mid off! What a stroke! It was a textbook cover-drive to a slightly over-pitched ball. Supreme timing
95kph, leg break outside off, and he's beaten all ends up, no idea which way that was spinning
top edged sweep shot just flies safely away from Stanlake running back from short fine, Stanlake slides and digs into the soft sandy turf. He gets up gingerly but is OK. Two after all that
shorter wrong un, he's back and punching wide of mid off
95kph, full leg break, he drives to mid off but cover coming across prevents any look at a single
wrong un edged just short of slip! Beautifully bowled, Hughes poked at it, got an edge but it bounced just short of Short at slip
leg break on middle, he drives firmly to long on
132kph, good length middle and leg, he defends from the crease to midwicket
134kph, length ball and he just picks the length and swings this up over wide mid on! Easily played by Hughes. Smart shot
137kph, half-volley, he drives through the line and beats the man diving at mid off! He was too wide to cut it off
118kph, short slower ball, he pulls this to deep fine leg
138kph, full outside off, he drives firmly to deep cover, they push for two but there's only one there
full outside off, he drives to long off
86kph, short wide wrong un, he punches off the back foot to deep point
91kph, fuller leg break, he's back and working against the turn to midwicket
94kph, leg break outside off, he's back, squared up defending
full outside off, he tries to sweep and it taken on the pad, it was well outside the line
wrong un, he picked it and heaves this hard and flat over midwicket one bounce four!
fuller on off, he pushes down to long on
126kph, slower ball outside off, he picked it, it was a half-volley and he smashes a drive straight of mid off! Too easy
smokes a pull shot flat over deep square! What power! 140kph, back of a length, he sits back and hammers this like a missile into the crowd!
141kph, back of a length on off, he's back and across, turning this to the gap at square leg
142kph, short ball, he initially went to duck and decided to pull late and nailed it behind square, beating wide fine leg!
127kph, slower ball leg cutter, it beats the edge as it slides across the left-hander
142kph, fuller on middle, he mistimes a drive to mid on who is on the circle and they pinch one
129kph, full on off, he works this with the wrists to the circle at wide mid on, they push for two but it's not on
111kph, length slower ball on off, he's back and working this wide of short fine
111kph, slower ball, off cutter, outside off, he tries to drive from the crease but misses
another swing and miss, this time at a length slower ball trying to pull through the leg side
132kph, fuller on off stump, he drives down to long on

almost an incredible run out! It was a slower ball, Henriques bunted it towards mid on and run, Laughlin runs across and dives full length to save it and backhand flicks without looking, it missed but Henriques was miles out!
length wrong un, he plays it off the pitch knocking it through square leg
74kph, wrong un but short and wide, he's back and cutting firmly behind point to the short boundary and Weatherald can't cut it off!
leg break on off, he mistimes a drive to midwicket
89kph faster leg break, it zips through off the pitch, Hughes was back to cut but misses
99kph, leg break on leg, he pushes this to the gap at midwicket
short leg break, he's back quickly, seizing on the length, he hammers a pull shot to the gap at the forwards square boundary!
fuller on off, he drives nicely and neatly to long on
133kph low full toss on middle, he clips this behind square to the man in the deep
130kph, full and wide of off, he drives but mistimes dragging it back to the bowler
127kph, full toss drifting wide of off, he tries to square drive but misses
117kph, slower ball, good length and it shoots a touch low under the bat and just past off stump!
128kph, full on middle and off, he clips this easily to deep midwicket along the ground
86kph, tossed up leg break, he drives to long off
shorter leg break, he tucks this off the back foot through midwicket
93kph, tossed up, he drives firmly past the bowler who can't stop it, to long on. 50 for Hughes. Superb knock
launches this over wide long on! No one does this to Rashid Khan! Leg break tossed up, he's down on one knee and lifting this high into the stands at wide long on!
shorter leg break, he's back and pulling fine, Stanlake dives over it at short fine and it races away!
another slog sweep from outside off over deep square! Another cracking strike! 50 for Henriques from just 26 balls! Wow
132kph, full outside off, he steers this behind point but can't find the gap
full on leg stump, he whips this firmly to deep midwicket
114kph, slower ball outside off, he steps outside the line to flick it over short fine, it comes off pad and runs fine just past leg stump! Four leg byes
shorter on the hip, he's back and working this easily behind square for two more
slower ball, shorter on leg, he is back and working this to the gap at forwards square and they sprint back for two more!
full on leg stump, 109kph, he clips this through square leg to the sweeper. 100 partnership up off just 66 balls.
low full toss hammered over deep midwicket into the stands! An exclamation mark on a thumping win! What a strike. What a win
